org.js4ms.rest.server

Class AbstractTimedSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.rest.server.AbstractSession
      • org.js4ms.rest.server.AbstractTimedSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionHandler, Session
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RtspSession

    public abstract class AbstractTimedSession
extends AbstractSession
    A session that self-terminates if it receives no messages within a specified time period.
    Author:
    gbumgard

    • Method Detail

      • handleTransaction

        public final boolean handleTransaction(Request request,
                        Response response)
                                throws IOException
        Parameters:
        request - - The Request message sent from the client to the server to initiate the transaction.
        response - - The Response message that will be sent from the server back to the client.
        Returns:
      • true to indicate that the handler has changed the response status code and transaction handling should be terminated.
      • false to indicate that the handler has not changed the response status code and transaction handling may continue.
        • Throws:
        IOException

      • doHandleTransaction

        public abstract boolean doHandleTransaction(Request request,
                          Response response)
                                     throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Description copied from interface: Session
        Terminates the session. This method might be used to indicate that a transaction sequence representing a session has reached its normal end-point, or may also be used to abort an ongoing session.
        Specified by:
        terminate in interface Session
        Overrides:
        terminate in class AbstractSession
